service.tagline: "High-performance interconnectivity for the most demanding networking requirements."
service.description: "GÉANT Lambda provides full wavelengths at up to 100Gbps to support NREN users with particularly demanding network requirements. The service provides transparent 10Gbps, or 100Gbps wavelengths between GÉANT PoPs. "
service.userValue: "Ideally suited to major international projects, Point-to-Point services offer a high performance networking solution."
service.options: "GÉANT Lambda services can be provided unprotected or restored using GMPLS (Generalised Multiprotocol Label Switching) signalling. "
